creator: mark.shotton@micromass.co.uk
text:
When closing the database connection, one of the two prepared statements is not 
closed and may subsequently be re-used causing an SQLException.

E.g. in authenticate method, if get an SQLException, dbConnection is closed and 
preparedAuthenticate is closed, but preparedRoles is not closed and may be re-
used later but will not work as the connection associated with it was closed.
